original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses, ‘Put your hand inside your robe.’ So Moses did this. When he took his hand out again, the skin had become white, like snow. It was the bad disease called leprosy.
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 그에게 이르시되 네 손을 품에 넣으라 하시매 그가 손을 품에 넣었다가 내어보니 그의 손에 나병이 생겨 눈 같이 된지라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to Moses
Put your hand inside your robe
sentences.korean_translation: 네 손을 네 겉옷 안에 넣으라

sentences.original_text: When he took his hand out again
the skin had become white, like snow
It was the bad disease called leprosy
